sql.query: select agr_appno,agr_noofadultanimal,agr_sqftperadultanimal,agr_adultshedamtpersqft, agr_costofconsofadultshed,agr_noofcalvesanimal,agr_noofheifersanimal,agr_calvesarea, agr_calvesamtpersqft,agr_costofcalvesshed,agr_equipmentcost_animal,agr_noofanimal, agr_costofequipment,agr_fencingcost_acre,agr_fencingarea,agr_costoffencing,agr_yieldingltr, agr_costofanimal,agr_totalcostofanimal,agr_maintenancecost,agr_firstbatchanimal,agr_insurancepercent, agr_insurancecost,agr_miscellaneouscost,agr_totunitcost,agr_heifersarea,agr_heifersamtpersqft, agr_costofheifersshed,agr_costofgodown,agr_animaltype from AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT where agr_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'
select facility_code from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^' and facility_agrschemetype='^' and facility_group='0' and facility_sno='^'
select sum(facility_proposed) as facility_proposed from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^' and facility_agrschemetype='^' and facility_group='0' and facility_sno='^'

select margin_prdcode,margin_id,margin_range_from,margin_range_to,margin_perct from COM_MARGINCOST where margin_prdcode='^' and ^ between margin_range_from and margin_range_to or ^ between margin_range_from and margin_range_to
delete from AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT where agr_appno=? and agr_schemetype=? and agr_facsno=?

insert into AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT(agr_appno,agr_noofadultanimal,agr_sqftperadultanimal,agr_adultshedamtpersqft,agr_costofconsofadultshed, agr_noofcalvesanimal,agr_noofheifersanimal,agr_calvesarea,agr_calvesamtpersqft, agr_costofcalvesshed,agr_equipmentcost_animal,agr_noofanimal,agr_costofequipment,agr_fencingcost_acre,agr_fencingarea, agr_costoffencing,agr_yieldingltr,agr_costofanimal,agr_totalcostofanimal,agr_maintenancecost, agr_firstbatchanimal,agr_insurancepercent,agr_insurancecost,agr_miscellaneouscost,agr_totunitcost,agr_heifersarea,agr_heifersamtpersqft,agr_costofheifersshed ,agr_costofgodown,agr_schemetype,agr_facsno,agr_animaltype) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select count(*) as total from AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION where agr_hrdproud_appno='^' and agr_facsno='^'

select agr_hrdproud_appno,agr_hrdproud_slno,agr_hrdproud_firstyear,agr_hrdproud_secondyear,agr_hrdproud_thirdyear, agr_hrdproud_fourthyear,agr_hrdproud_fifthyear,agr_hrdproud_sixthyear from AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION where agr_hrdproud_appno='^' and agr_hrdproud_slno=^ and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'

select agr_findata_appno,agr_findata_milkcost,agr_findata_manurecost,agr_findata_buffaloecost, agr_findata_adult_vetaid,agr_findata_heifer_vetaid,agr_findata_electric_cost,agr_findata_heifer_foddercost, agr_findata_labour_count,agr_findata_labour_salary,agr_findata_lact_grnfodderwt,agr_findata_lact_dryfodderwt, agr_findata_lact_concnfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_grnfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_dryfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_concnfodderwt, agr_findata_grnfodder_cost,agr_findata_dryfodder_cost,agr_findata_concnfodder_cost,agr_findata_heifer_feedcost from AGR_DAIRYFINANCIALDATA where agr_findata_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'
delete from AGR_DAIRYFINANCIALDATA where agr_findata_appno=? and agr_schemetype=? and agr_facsno=?

insert into AGR_DAIRYFINANCIALDATA (agr_findata_appno,agr_findata_milkcost,agr_findata_manurecost,agr_findata_buffaloecost, agr_findata_adult_vetaid,agr_findata_heifer_vetaid,agr_findata_electric_cost,agr_findata_heifer_foddercost, agr_findata_labour_count,agr_findata_labour_salary,agr_findata_lact_grnfodderwt,agr_findata_lact_dryfodderwt, agr_findata_lact_concnfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_grnfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_dryfodderwt,agr_findata_dry_concnfodderwt, agr_findata_grnfodder_cost,agr_findata_dryfodder_cost,agr_findata_concnfodder_cost,agr_findata_heifer_feedcost,agr_schemetype,agr_facsno) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION where agr_hrdproud_appno=? and agr_schemetype=? and agr_facsno=?
delete from AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION where agr_hrdproud_appno=? and agr_facsno=? and agr_hrdproud_slno=? or agr_hrdproud_slno=?

insert into AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION(agr_hrdproud_appno,agr_hrdproud_slno,agr_hrdproud_firstyear,agr_hrdproud_secondyear,agr_hrdproud_thirdyear, agr_hrdproud_fourthyear,agr_hrdproud_fifthyear,agr_hrdproud_sixthyear,agr_schemetype,agr_facsno) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select agr_hrdproud_appno,agr_hrdproud_slno,agr_hrdproud_firstyear,agr_hrdproud_secondyear,agr_hrdproud_thirdyear, agr_hrdproud_fourthyear,agr_hrdproud_fifthyear,agr_hrdproud_sixthyear from AGR_DAIRYHERDPRODUCTION where agr_hrdproud_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^' order by agr_hrdproud_slno
select agr_noofadultanimal,agr_totunitcost,agr_maintenancecost,agr_animaltype from AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT where agr_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'
delete from AGR_DAIRYINCOMESTATEMENT where AGR_INCSTAT_APPNO=? and agr_schemetype=? and agr_facsno=?

insert into AGR_DAIRYINCOMESTATEMENT(agr_incstat_appno,agr_incstat_slno,agr_incstat_firstyear,agr_incstat_secondyear, agr_incstat_thirdyear,agr_incstat_fourthyear,agr_incstat_fifthyear,agr_incstat_sixthyear,agr_schemetype,agr_facsno,AGR_CYCLEDATA, AGR_LACTATIONDAYS,AGR_DRYDAYS,AGR_BATCH2DAYS) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select agr_findata_milkcost,agr_findata_manurecost,agr_findata_buffaloecost from AGR_DAIRYFINANCIALDATA where agr_findata_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'
select agr_yieldingltr,agr_firstbatchanimal from AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT where agr_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'

select agr_incstat_appno,agr_incstat_slno,agr_incstat_firstyear,agr_incstat_secondyear, agr_incstat_thirdyear,agr_incstat_fourthyear,agr_incstat_fifthyear,agr_incstat_sixthyear,AGR_CYCLEDATA,AGR_LACTATIONDAYS,AGR_DRYDAYS,AGR_BATCH2DAYS from AGR_DAIRYINCOMESTATEMENT where AGR_INCSTAT_APPNO='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^' order by AGR_INCSTAT_SLNO

select agr_incstat_appno,agr_incstat_slno,agr_incstat_firstyear,agr_incstat_secondyear, agr_incstat_thirdyear,agr_incstat_fourthyear,agr_incstat_fifthyear,agr_incstat_sixthyear,AGR_CYCLEDATA,AGR_LACTATIONDAYS,AGR_DRYDAYS,AGR_BATCH2DAYS from AGR_DAIRYINCOMESTATEMENT where AGR_INCSTAT_APPNO='^' and AGR_INCSTAT_SLNO in (^) and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'
delete from AGR_DIARYRECURRINGEXPENDITURE where agr_recexp_appno=? and agr_schemetype=? and agr_facsno=?

insert into AGR_DIARYRECURRINGEXPENDITURE(agr_recexp_appno,agr_recexp_year1,agr_recexp_year2, agr_recexp_year3,agr_recexp_year4,agr_recexp_year5,agr_recexp_year6,agr_schemetype,agr_facsno)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update AGR_DAIRYCOSTOFINVESTMENT set agr_maintenancecost=?,agr_totunitcost=? where agr_appno=? and agr_facsno=?

select agr_incstat_appno,agr_incstat_firstyear,agr_incstat_secondyear,agr_incstat_thirdyear, agr_incstat_fourthyear,agr_incstat_fifthyear,agr_incstat_sixthyear from AGR_DAIRYINCOMESTATEMENT where agr_incstat_appno='^' and agr_incstat_slno='15' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'

select agr_recexp_year1,agr_recexp_year2,agr_recexp_year3,agr_recexp_year4,agr_recexp_year5, agr_recexp_year6 from AGR_DIARYRECURRINGEXPENDITURE where agr_recexp_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and agr_facsno='^'

select agr_sno,agr_df,agr_year1,agr_year2,agr_year3, agr_year4,agr_year5,agr_year6,agr_year7,agr_year8,agr_year9,agr_year10, agr_year11,agr_year12,agr_year13,agr_year14,agr_year15 from AGR_HORTICULTUREAPPDF where agr_appno='^' and AGR_SCHEMETYPE='^'

select agr_sno,agr_df,agr_year1,agr_year2, agr_year3,agr_year4,agr_year5,agr_year6,agr_year7,agr_year8, agr_year9,agr_year10,agr_year11,agr_year12,agr_year13,agr_year14,agr_year15 from AGR_HORTICULTUREDF order by agr_df

select agr_sof_state,agr_sof_district,agr_sof_crop,agr_sof_amount, to_char(agr_sof_fromdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as agr_sof_fromdate,to_char(agr_sof_todate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_sof_todate, agr_sof_sno,agr_sof_type,agr_sof_sofperplant from AGR_SCALEOFFINANCE where agr_sof_state='^' and agr_sof_district='^' and agr_type='130' and agr_sof_todate >= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')

select agr_cas_season,agr_cas_sno,agr_cas_crop,agr_cas_sowmon, agr_cas_harvmon,agr_cas_areacul,agr_cas_amount, agr_cas_eligibility,agr_cas_limapplied,agr_cas_limitrecom, to_char(agr_cas_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_cas_duedate, AGR_CAS_COSTOFCULTIVATION,AGR_CAS_STATE,AGR_CAS_DISTRICT,agr_cas_plantname, agr_noofplants,agr_measurementtype,AGR_SCLOFFIN,agr_cas_assessmenttype from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' and AGR_FACSNO='^'

select agr_cas_season,agr_cas_sno,agr_cas_crop,agr_cas_sowmon, agr_cas_harvmon,agr_cas_areacul,agr_cas_amount, agr_cas_eligibility,agr_cas_limapplied,agr_cas_limitrecom, to_char(agr_cas_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_cas_duedate, AGR_CAS_COSTOFCULTIVATION,AGR_CAS_STATE,AGR_CAS_DISTRICT,agr_cas_plantname, agr_noofplants,agr_measurementtype,AGR_SCLOFFIN,agr_cas_assessmenttype from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno='^' and agr_schemetype='^'

insert into AGR_CROPASSESSMENT (agr_cas_appno,agr_cas_season,agr_cas_sno,agr_cas_crop,agr_cas_sowmon, agr_cas_harvmon,agr_cas_areacul,agr_cas_amount, agr_cas_eligibility,agr_cas_limapplied,agr_cas_limitrecom,agr_cas_duedate,AGR_CAS_COSTOFCULTIVATION, AGR_CAS_STATE,AGR_CAS_DISTRICT,agr_cas_plantname,agr_noofplants,agr_measurementtype,AGR_SCLOFFIN,agr_schemetype,AGR_FACSNO,AGR_CAS_ASSESSMENTTYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update AGR_CROPASSESSMENT set agr_cas_season=?,agr_cas_crop=?,agr_cas_sowmon=?, agr_cas_harvmon=?,agr_cas_areacul=?,agr_cas_amount=?, agr_cas_eligibility=?,agr_cas_limapplied=?,agr_cas_limitrecom=?,agr_cas_duedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),AGR_CAS_COSTOFCULTIVATION=?, AGR_CAS_STATE=?,AGR_CAS_DISTRICT=?,agr_cas_plantname=?,agr_noofplants=?,agr_measurementtype=?,AGR_SCLOFFIN=?,agr_schemetype=?,agr_cas_assessmenttype=? where agr_cas_appno=? and agr_cas_sno=? and AGR_FACSNO=?
delete from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno=? and AGR_FACSNO=? and agr_schemetype=?
delete from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno=? and AGR_FACSNO=? and agr_schemetype=? and AGR_CAS_ASSESSMENTTYPE=?
select nvl(max(agr_cas_sno),0) as maxid from AGR_CROPASSESSMENT where agr_cas_appno='^'
select app_valuesin,app_status from applications where app_no='^'

insert into AGR_FARMMACHINERY (agr_fam_appno,AGR_FAM_CATEGORY,agr_fam_vehicletype,agr_fam_brandname,agr_fam_make,agr_fam_model, agr_fam_costoftractor,agr_fam_costoftrailor,agr_fam_costofimpliment,agr_fam_totalcost,agr_fam_proformadate, agr_fam_valuationdone,agr_fam_dateofvaluation,agr_fam_nameofdealer,agr_fam_dealersince,agr_fam_address1, agr_fam_address2,agr_fam_district,agr_fam_authoriseddealer,agr_fam_dateofdelivery,agr_fam_city,agr_fam_state, agr_fam_pincode,agr_fam_comments,agr_fam_others,agr_fam_othercost,agr_schemetype,AGR_FACSNO,agr_fam_depriciation) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from AGR_FARMMACHINERY where AGR_FAM_APPNO=? and AGR_FACSNO=? and AGR_SCHEMETYPE=?

select AGR_FAM_CATEGORY,agr_fam_vehicletype,agr_fam_brandname,agr_fam_make,agr_fam_model,agr_fam_costoftractor, agr_fam_costoftrailor,agr_fam_costofimpliment,agr_fam_totalcost,to_char(agr_fam_proformadate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_fam_proformadate,agr_fam_valuationdone,to_char(agr_fam_dateofvaluation,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_fam_dateofvaluation, agr_fam_nameofdealer,agr_fam_dealersince,agr_fam_address1,agr_fam_address2,agr_fam_district,agr_fam_authoriseddealer, to_char(agr_fam_dateofdelivery,'dd/mm/yyyy')as agr_fam_dateofdelivery,agr_fam_city,agr_fam_state,agr_fam_pincode, agr_fam_comments,agr_fam_others,agr_fam_othercost,AGR_FACSNO,agr_schemetype,agr_fam_depriciation from AGR_FARMMACHINERY where agr_fam_appno='^' and AGR_FACSNO='^' and agr_schemetype='^'
select facility_proposed,FACILITY_SCHEMETYPE,facility_code,facility_sno,facility_oldappno,facility_oldappsno from facilities where facility_appno = '^'

insert into AGR_BILLSPURCHASE(BP_APPNO,BP_SNO,BP_SANCTIONAMT,BP_NUMBER1,BP_AMOUNT1 ,BP_NUMBER2,BP_AMOUNT2,BP_NUMBER3,BP_AMOUNT3,BP_NUMBER4,BP_AMOUNT4,BP_NUMBER5,BP_AMOUNT5 ,BP_NUMBER6,BP_AMOUNT6,BP_NUMBER7,BP_AMOUNT7,BP_NUMBER8,BP_AMOUNT8,BP_NUMBER9,BP_AMOUNT9 ,BP_NUMBER10,BP_AMOUNT10,BP_NUMBER11,BP_AMOUNT11,BP_EXCESS,BP_COMMENTS,BP_YEAR_SNO,Bp_Inlandexpbills,bp_advancecmts,BP_NUMBER12,BP_AMOUNT12,BP_NUMBER13,BP_AMOUNT13,bd_idpmscnts) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update AGR_BILLSPURCHASE set BP_SANCTIONAMT=?,BP_NUMBER1=?,BP_AMOUNT1=?,BP_NUMBER2=?,BP_AMOUNT2=?,BP_NUMBER3=?,BP_AMOUNT3=?, BP_NUMBER4=?,BP_AMOUNT4=?,BP_NUMBER5=?,BP_AMOUNT5=?,BP_NUMBER6=?,BP_AMOUNT6=?,BP_NUMBER7=?, BP_AMOUNT7=?,BP_NUMBER8=?,BP_AMOUNT8=?,BP_NUMBER9=?,BP_AMOUNT9=?,BP_NUMBER10=?,BP_AMOUNT10=?, BP_NUMBER11=?,BP_AMOUNT11=?,BP_EXCESS=?,BP_COMMENTS=?,BP_YEAR_SNO=?,Bp_Inlandexpbills=?,bp_advancecmts=?,BP_NUMBER12=?,BP_AMOUNT12=?,BP_NUMBER13=?,BP_AMOUNT13=?,bd_idpmscnts=? where BP_APPNO=? and BP_SNO=?
delete from AGR_BILLSPURCHASE where BP_APPNO=? and BP_SNO=?
delete from agr_billspurchase where bp_appno=? and bp_year_sno=?

select BP_APPNO,BP_SNO,BP_SANCTIONAMT,BP_NUMBER1,BP_AMOUNT1,BP_NUMBER2, BP_AMOUNT2,BP_NUMBER3,BP_AMOUNT3,BP_NUMBER4,BP_AMOUNT4,BP_NUMBER5,BP_AMOUNT5,BP_NUMBER6, BP_AMOUNT6,BP_NUMBER7,BP_AMOUNT7,BP_NUMBER8,BP_AMOUNT8,BP_NUMBER9,BP_AMOUNT9,BP_NUMBER10, BP_AMOUNT10,BP_NUMBER11,BP_AMOUNT11,BP_EXCESS,BP_COMMENTS,BP_YEAR_SNO,Bp_Inlandexpbills,bp_advancecmts,BP_NUMBER12,BP_AMOUNT12,BP_NUMBER13,BP_AMOUNT13,bd_idpmscnts from AGR_BILLSPURCHASE where BP_APPNO='^' and BP_INLANDEXPBILLS='^' order by bp_sno
select NVL(max(BP_SNO),0)+1 as sno from AGR_BILLSPURCHASE where BP_APPNO='^'

INSERT INTO AGR_INCOMEHIRESERV (AGR_IHS_APPNO,AGR_IHS_ONFARM,AGR_IHS_OFFFARM,AGR_IHS_HIRINGTRANS, AGR_IHS_TOTALHRS,AGR_IHS_INCMCUSTOM,AGR_IHS_TOTINCMCUSTOM,AGR_IHS_LESSOPERATION,AGR_IHS_NOOFLITRES, AGR_IHS_AMTPERLITRE,AGR_IHS_FUELHRS,AGR_IHS_FUELLUB,AGR_IHS_FUELCOST,AGR_IHS_DRIVERSALMON, AGR_IHS_DRIVERSALYR,AGR_IHS_INSURETAX,AGR_IHS_REPAIRMAINTAIN,AGR_IHS_TOTDEDUC,AGR_IHS_NETINCOME, AGR_IHS_OWNFARM,AGR_IHS_FAMILYFARM,AGR_SCHEMETYPE,AGR_IHS_OTREXP,AGR_EXTENTOFLAND,AGR_FACSNO) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM AGR_INCOMEHIRESERV where AGR_IHS_APPNO=? and AGR_FACSNO=? and AGR_SCHEMETYPE=?
select af_appno,af_sno,af_particulars,af_presentposition,af_proposeddevelopment from AGR_FISHERY_PARTICULARS where af_appno='^' and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' order by af_sno
delete from AGR_FISHERY_PARTICULARS where af_appno=? and agr_facsno = ? and agr_schemetype=?
insert into AGR_FISHERY_PARTICULARS(af_appno,af_sno,af_particulars,af_presentposition,af_proposeddevelopment,agr_facsno,agr_schemetype) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select investment_type,estimated_cost,margin,loan_amount from agr_fisheries_investments where appno='^' and investment_id='^'and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^'

select appno, ownership_type, lease_period, tank_length, tank_breath, tank_debth, normal_water_level, summar_water_level, boat_type, boat_length, boat_breath, boat_catch_capacity, tank_rent_year from agr_fisheries_other_param where appno='^' and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^'
delete from agr_fisheries_investments where appno=? and agr_facsno=? and agr_schemetype=?
delete from agr_fisheries_other_param where appno=? and agr_facsno=? and agr_schemetype=?
insert into agr_fisheries_investments(appno, investment_id, investment_type, estimated_cost, margin, loan_amount,agr_facsno,agr_schemetype) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into agr_fisheries_other_param(appno, ownership_type, lease_period, tank_length, tank_breath, tank_debth, normal_water_level, summar_water_level, boat_type, boat_length, boat_breath, boat_catch_capacity, tank_rent_year,agr_facsno,agr_schemetype) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select * from agr_common_req where agr_common_appno='^' and agr_common_seqno=^ and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^'
select * from agr_common_req where agr_common_appno='^' and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^' order by agr_common_type

update agr_common_req set agr_common_particulars=?, agr_common_type=?, agr_common_units_num=?, agr_common_unitcost=?, agr_common_amount=? where agr_common_appno=? and agr_common_seqno=? and agr_facsno=? and agr_schemetype=?

select agr_fishboat, agr_fishNets, agr_fishFeed, agr_fishFingerlings, agr_fishFishConsuming, agr_fishpreservation, agr_fishTransport, agr_fishDemand , agr_experience , agr_marketing,agr_processing,af_projecttype from agr_marketingfish where agr_fishappno='^' and agr_facsno='^' and agr_schemetype='^'
delete from agr_marketingfish where agr_fishappno=? and agr_facsno=? and agr_schemetype=?

insert into agr_marketingfish(agr_fishappno, agr_fishboat, agr_fishNets, agr_fishFeed, agr_fishFingerlings, agr_fishFishConsuming, agr_fishpreservation, agr_fishTransport, agr_fishDemand,agr_facsno,agr_schemetype,agr_experience,agr_marketing,agr_processing,af_projecttype)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update AGR_DSS_ASSESSMENT set AGR_DSS_NETINCOME=? where APPNO=? and AGR_DSS_FINSNO=?

select BP_APPNO,BP_SNO,BP_SANCTIONAMT,BP_NUMBER1,BP_AMOUNT1,BP_NUMBER2, BP_AMOUNT2,BP_NUMBER3,BP_AMOUNT3,BP_NUMBER4,BP_AMOUNT4,BP_NUMBER5,BP_AMOUNT5,BP_NUMBER6, BP_AMOUNT6,BP_NUMBER7,BP_AMOUNT7,BP_NUMBER8,BP_AMOUNT8,BP_NUMBER9,BP_AMOUNT9,BP_NUMBER10, BP_AMOUNT10,BP_NUMBER11,BP_AMOUNT11,BP_EXCESS,BP_COMMENTS,BP_YEAR_SNO,Bp_Inlandexpbills,bp_advancecmts,BP_NUMBER12,BP_AMOUNT12,BP_NUMBER13,BP_AMOUNT13,bd_idpmscnts from AGR_BILLSPURCHASE where BP_APPNO='^' and Bp_Inlandexpbills='^' order by bp_sno

insert into AGR_DSS_ASSESSMENT(appno,agr_dss_sno,agr_dss_extinstalment,agr_dss_extintrest,AGR_DSS_TYPE,AGR_DSS_FACSNO,AGR_DSS_LOANTYPE,AGR_DSS_EMITYPE,AGR_DSS_INTAMT,AGR_DSS_INITINT) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(AGR_DSS_SNO),0) as PreviousValue from AGR_DSS_ASSESSMENT where appno='^'
delete from AGR_DSS_ASSESSMENT where appno=?

select afp_sno,afp_year,afp_activityid, afp_costunit,afp_area,afp_totcost,afp_margin,afp_bankloan,afp_parent,afp_adpcost,afp_areaunit, afp_costunitto,agr_specifications from agr_finprogramme where afp_appno='^' and afp_year='^' and afp_schemetype='^' and afp_facsno='^' order by afp_year , afp_parent ,afp_sno
select distinct (afp_year) as afp_year from agr_finprogramme where afp_appno='^' and afp_facsno='^' order by afp_year
select distinct (afp_facsno) as afp_facsno from agr_finprogramme where afp_appno='^' and afp_facsno is not null order by afp_facsno

select facility_sno,afp_facsno,afp_sno,afp_year,afp_activityid, afp_costunit,afp_area,afp_totcost,afp_margin,afp_bankloan,afp_parent,afp_adpcost,afp_areaunit, afp_costunitto,(select com_facdesc from facility_corp where com_facid=facility_code)as facdesc,agr_specifications from agr_finprogramme,facilities where afp_appno='^' and afp_facsno='^' and afp_appno=facility_appno and facility_sno=afp_facsno order by afp_facsno,afp_year
